price: (Nkͻmhyεni), ka sε: “Aseda wͻ Nyankopͻn, na Asomdwoeε nka Ne nkoa no a Wayi wͻn no. Nyankopͻn na Ͻyε, anaasε deε wͻde bata Ne ho no (na εyε)?”
arabic: قُلِ ٱلۡحَمۡدُ لِلَّهِ وَسَلَٰمٌ عَلَىٰ عِبَادِهِ ٱلَّذِينَ ٱصۡطَفَىٰٓۗ ءَآللَّهُ خَيۡرٌ أَمَّا يُشۡرِكُونَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: quli al-ḥamdu lillahi wasalāmun ʿalā ʿibādihi alladhīna iṣ'ṭafā āllahu khayrun ammā yush'rikūna
